column4: I'm doing a survey before I partition my drive. how much space does ubuntu filesystem need, and how much does the home folder need?
to answer your question 15GB for / is plenty /home is up to you
I have no way in the universe at guessing what apps you will be installing, that said you need a minimum of 1GB for /home all the way up to 1000TB
This channel is for Ubuntu specific support. Please stick to the topic.
